description: Email your records to yourself or to the doctor.     * BP Tracker allows you to keep track of blood pressures from day to day.     * Measuring your BP level can help you control many issues.     * So, with this BP tracker, you can keep a daily log of your BP readings.     * Take the readings at different times of a day.     * This simplifies the blood pressure data logging.     * So, start tracking your blood pressure over time & get the summary of the logs through graph.  FEATURES:     * Track the blood pressure, save the logs & get the summary through graphs.     * Adding a blood pressure log is very easier.     * The interactive charts & statistics can help you & your doctor in tracking your logs easily & quickly.     * Simple and clean interface
